archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1066
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want to be notified if i have made several 'out of plan' micropurchases and be moved to an add on if I reach that value (I.e you opted to pay $1.50p/min but there was an add-on for $10 for 10mins you should be given it), so I know I am getting the best deal available.

properties.value: CSN: OOTB notification template, trigger outside of BSS

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
